mapper.select: SELECT tg.gosu_number,question_number, tu.user_number, question_title, question_content, question_date, question_viewcnt, question_status, last_update FROM tbl_question tq join tbl_user tu join tbl_gosu tg on tq.user_number = tu.user_number where tg.gosu_number = tq.gosu_number and tg.gosu_number=#{gosuNumber} order by question_date asc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
